events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their vehicle that occurred at the intersection downtown early this morning.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under 'Auto Accident' due to keywords such as vehicle and collision found in the report.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the claim and contact the customer for further details and documentation.
The customer received confirmation that their claim has been acknowledged and is now under review by the claims department.
The customer was asked to provide photos of the vehicle damage and a copy of the police accident report to proceed with the claim.
All required documents, including vehicle photos and the official police report, were submitted by the customer for review.
Claim investigation commenced to verify the details of the collision and assess damage severity as part of the claim process.
The investigation concluded with confirmation of the collision facts and damage estimates from the vehicle inspection.
A settlement offer was sent to the customer covering the estimated repair costs and associated expenses related to the accident.
The customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the insurer's handling of the claim.
The claim was officially approved by the claims manager, enabling the payout process to begin promptly.
The insurer issued payment to the customer to cover the vehicle repair costs in accordance with the approved settlement.
Following the payment, the claim was closed with all necessary documentation completed and confirmed by the customer.
